meanings.sent1: She redefected to the other team after realizing her mistake.
meanings.sent2: He redefected to his original country after spending a year abroad.
meanings.sent3: The spy redefected so many times that no one knew whose side he was on.
meanings.sent4: Her loyalty redefected like a pendulum swinging back and forth.
meanings.sent5: The soldier's decision to redefect was met with suspicion and confusion.

meanings.sent1: The redefected agent was closely monitored by both sides.
meanings.sent2: She was a redefected citizen, torn between two countries.
meanings.sent3: The redefected politician's speeches were always full of surprises.
meanings.sent4: His redefected status made him a target for recruitment by multiple factions.
meanings.sent5: The redefected soldier stood out in the crowd, unsure of where to belong.
